titles.title: From Heaven Above to Earth I Come

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From heav'n above to earth I come, to bear good news to ev'ry home; glad tidings of great joy I bring whereof I now will say and sing:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To you, this night, is born a Child of Mary, chosen mother mild; this tender Child of lowly birth shall be the joy of all the earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 'Tis Christ our God, who far on high had heard your sad and bitter cry; Himself will your Salvation be, Himself from sin will make you free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Now let us all, with gladsome cheer, follow the shepherds, and draw near to see this wondrous Gift of God, who hath His own dear Son bestowed.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Glory to God in highest heav'n, who unto us His Son has giv'n, while angels sing, with pious mirth, a glad New Year to all the earth.
